name: Assemble the Chariots
description: '''Assemble the Chariots''' is a Finnish [[symphonic deathcore]] band, formed in 2008. The band has released four EPs, the last of which, ''The Celestials'', having been independently released in July 2020, and re-released on 25 September 2020 via Seek and Strike records. The band's debut full-length album ''Unyielding Night'' was released in July 2024. The album received many positive reviews. The band has released a music video for "Evermurk". The band took part in [[Caliban (band)|Caliban's]] "Back From Hell" European tour in April and May 2025, alongside [[In Hearts Wake]] and [[Cabal (band)|Cabal]].
